snippet: --The Washington Republic, in the course of an article defending the President's course in the Cuban affair, condemns Mr. OWEN, Consul at Havana, for his "inaction and seeming Indifference." --The Secretary of War returned to Washington on Wednesd...
lead_paragraph: --The Washington Republic, in the course of an article defending the President's course in the Cuban affair, condemns Mr. OWEN, Consul at Havana, for his "inaction and seeming Indifference." --The Secretary of War returned to Washington on Wednesday evening.
